title: Nunu & Willump VGU: WIP Thread
body:
Hey All!

Our Freljordian Friends are on  PBE and playable, but that does not mean we are entirely finished with they two of them. These boyos were a complex undertaking, and we still need to wrap up a few polish points, these are things we are still tackling, that you may have noticed as well. 


~~* Clean Up to Zombie Snowball.~~
~~* Jungle Clear VO Bug Fixes.~~
~~* Minor Tweaks to Sasquatch Willumps Beard.~~
~~* Various Horn position tweaks to help with clipping/hand placement.~~
~~* Claws for Willump Bot Blood Boil Passive.~~
~~* Various Bug Fixes.~~
~~* Minor Polish Across all Skin Textures.~~
~~* Minor Polish Across Base/Skin VFX~~.
~~* Smooth Size Scaling for The Biggest Snowball Ever.~~
~~* Turn Rate Polish for The Biggest Snowball Ever. ~~
~~* Add Faces to Nunu & Willummp Bot's Snowball when they throw it.~~
~~* Adjust the Base Splash Eyes to be blue~~
~~* Custom Music for Nunu & Willump Bot Dance~~

replies.body: Why was Willump given extra arms?

> [{quoted}](name=Linna Excel,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=LMJO2xwO,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-08-14T20:55:10.450+0000)
>
> Why was Willump given extra arms?

Twice as much hugging power, and now that he's more lovable he needs it.
Fair enough.
What happened to the "Now watch and learn from my moves, just like I've learned from Phreak's." taunt from original Nunu bot?

The "Special Interactions" videos on SkinSpotlights only show some of the lines. The ones that are "special interactions." {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} There's a lot more you can hear on PBE! Some of it arguably just as special and interactive.
Please, PLEASE bring this one back. I love NewNu Bot but it needs just a _few_ more of its older quotes back. That shouldn't be too hard to do, right?

I'm a big fan of the Phreak reference... but what happens if Phreak ever ceases to be a rioter (or even just changes roles so he's not so player facing)? It's not really a line that would make sense anymore so doesn't necessarily have the same potential longevity as other more in-universe lines.

(That said, I haven't listened through lines, so maybe theres other explicit references to real world people out there that'd indicate that's not a concern.)
Well, the Morellonomicon still exists.

True, but item name homages are a bit more subtle and those who don't know better may not even realise they're tributes, so people would think they're just plays on necronomicon/biscuits/homewreckers (probably others I'm forgetting) instead of people references.

Explicitly talking about Phreak as a person on the other hand would leave people going "Wait who? I don't get it." for someone who is not familiar with Phreak. He might be public enough that it's just an opportunity to go look back at old vids or whatever (plus I doubt Phreak has plans to part with riot anytime soon, but who knows) so maybe it's k, I just think I understand cutting the line.
Can we please get a CTRL + 5 to change from various faces on Nunu Bot?

I know Sasquatch is a 520 rp and all 520 rp skins must die, but would it be possible to have colors matching the model? No effects, no sounds, no nothing, but having a model green/brown and the ball blue/the atk speed buff to ally blue, the r field blu feels really ugly and a bit misleading to see...

I second this. He looks nothing like the splash.

As I took a look at the model i noticed the model looked a little weird.

When i zoomed in, I noticed his bangs are way shorter than they are in the splash art (It looks like he's shaved half of it off), and his eyebrows and eyes are a totally different colour.

Greyish eyebrows, and light blue eyes on the model, and black eyebrows and purple-ish eyes in the splash art. Hell, even the little tassles and bits of the blue-design on his cape-thing are missing (I can't remember what they're called).

[Image for Reference](https://i.imgur.com/PUUEYus.png)

just posting bugs i found so far

-Their W allowed them to clip through some terrain such as the thin corner of the mid lane river walls and the turrets.
-W indicator doesn't seem to be accurate as I've gone far past what was shown (with movement speed items)

For the Nunubot skin, is there a way to disable Nunu's voice and only have Willump Bot's? The derpy text-to-speech is the primary focus, which is great, but I'd rather _only_ have  that. Nunu's voice kinda ruins the VO in my view, but since some people seem to like it, could a disable option be added for those who don't?
Will there be “transition” animations from doing abilities/AA into walking. Akali has those and it is one of the coolest additions and I hope it’s the new standard

Can you make in-game Grungy Willump's face look more like the splash art? His in-game face looks a little strange, almost creepy, which is completely different from the adorable Willump in the splash. I think it might be due to the eyes, but I'm not entirely sure.
Sasquatch seems out of place with the snow. Any chance his snowball could be recolored into mud or something?

I have three things that I would like to be changed to the Zombie Nunu skin, and I can't really find a place to post them so here seems to be ok. They're just some small changes to his different taunts that would make the skin look much more clean. I will list them from easiest to hardest.

1. Change the sneeze

When Zombie Nunu laughs Willump sneezes and the problem is that the sneeze cloud he creates looks like snow or some kind of frost. It would look much better if it was coloured green, making it look radioactive or something. I've made an example.
https://i.imgur.com/FESZSlL.png

2. Change the Snowman

This one has been requsted before but it would really improve the skin. The easiest solution would be to change the snowmans hue to be more slimy green looking, but the best anwser would be to make a new model, because then you could make it look like the slayer pantheon skin, giving Zombie Willump a reason for disliking and smashing it. I've made an example of what it could look like.
https://i.imgur.com/kMmCLN2.png

3. Change the flute music

Here's the hardest one, but it would be really cool. Give Zombie Nunu a diferent tune when he's playing the flute. The music he should be playing is the one from the Zombie login, harrowing 2015. I looked at which part would fit best and I came to the conclusion that at 47 seconds in, if you slow down the video to 0.5 speed, then it sounds really cool, and would fit very well if you played it on a flute.
https://youtu.be/r-_fNivZXno?t=47

Those are the things that, in my opinion, would make the skin look much more clean, and would give a lot more depth to it. I really love the new Nunu&Willump, and I hope to play and have lots of fun with this skin, I just want it to look perfect!
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

One error I noticed is that in the splash art for Workshop Nunu & Willump, Nunu has brown hair but in game, he has orange??? I don't know which is the error but I personally like the brown better than the orange
I agree. I think the orange hair looks bad and doesn't match the splash at all. Brown hair would make workshop Nunu look a lot better{{champion:20}}

Snowball on Grungy should be more colorful, something similar to [the pixar ball](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/disney/images/8/87/PixarBall.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20121010232749)

Darker snow and effects (purple-ish) on Demolisher
Aurora-like effects on Workshop (like in splashart) / with some golden bits like snow fawn poppy
Dark-green/brownish loose leaves/foliage effects on Sasquatch?

But you guys totally nailed it on Nunu Bot, love it so much h4h4h4h4h4h4h4h4h4h4h4h4...

> Add Faces to Nunu & Willummp Bot's Snowball when they throw it.

Please make them like the reacts on Facebook lol, would be super neat if we could throw some angery's
---
Edit: 
Zombie Willump should only have 2 antennae like his splash art

Grungy Willump's blue should be closer to Tristana's skin color and a lighter color on his nose

Passive indicator/ the flute should also be different object, 
- Demolisher could be a horn.
- Grungy could be a muticolored toy flute or recorder
- Twig/Branch with a few leaves for Sasquatch
- Workshop could have a bow/wrapper around or bow on beige-orange-ish flute + aurora-like glowing.
- Summoner's cup for TPA

When willump destroys the snowman in his recall animation make it have a Azubu Frost logo on the TPA skin. That would be so amazing
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I can't play with Nunu & Willump's skins because I have no RP on the PBE.
Can you guys make the skins worth 1 BE for us to test them? I kinda want to try them out but the RP bug is stopping me from doing so.
Nunu allgemein ist eigentlich cool.. Aber die W ist echt asozial...

Yay, you changed the Snowman, and it looks really awesome, lots of thanks for that one! The only thing I could really ask for now is the snowy sneeze. It would look alot better if it was greenish in colour.
Would it be possible to make Sasquatch Nunu and Willump roll a stone so it better fits the theme?
classic skin loading screen needs to be moved upwards

Hey, sorry I know this is probably the wrong place, but I just want to post this somewhere it might find who I'm looking for :s

> [{quoted}](name=Slythrin Umbreon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iv25f4HM,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-08-16T22:21:17.234+0000)
>
> But I just want to say, _IF_ he ever does need nerfs, can we look at the roll away on his Snowball?
> Watching YouTube videos (I know, I know... :c), and saw a few scenes where players CC&#039;d Nunu out of his charge and still get hit by the snowball and die. I love the champion and I love the rework, but I don&#039;t want this to turn out to be &quot;Flash away the moment Nunu and Willump roll out of the fog or you die.&quot; To be fair, this might just be something players need to learn and get used to. I don&#039;t mind waiting a bit to see. But if he _does_ need nerfs, can we look at this first? It really stands out as being the most unfair thing in his kit by a_ long shot_.
> Probably in the form of some kind of penalty to the Knockup duration if Nunu is hard CCd out of it.

1. In Zombie Nunu's splash it shows that Willump has 2 antenna thingys on his head but in-game he has 4.

2.Zombie Nunu's Biggest Snowball EVER is actually too bright or bold err or was it heavy? I dunno, it hurts to look at, like it really physically hurts to look at. The way it looks when it moves through bushes actually looks perfect for what it should have been.
Nunu plush when?
pls give fizz an actual rework too ty :]

>
> pls give fizz an actual rework too ty :]

He's gotta be looooooooong down on the list. Maybe a few years?
Shouldnt be, if he gets fucked up in a class update that Riot admitted was bad, he should have priority. Same goes for other champs from class updates like Morde.

Already confirmed for next year so didn't include him
where is shaco and soraka or sona
Sorry was doing and was just making sure I got down at least 10 at a quick glance.
Give Sasquatch mudball, pretty please!
It will be possible to have Willump portraits in-game too or it will just be Nunu ?

Just Nunu, almost definitely.
{{champion:203}} {{champion:133}} {{item:3070}}
i find TPA Willump's face to be quite expressionless compared to their other skins, it feels rather bland, perhaps changing up the face, specifically the eyes could help :)

Will there be an AMA at some point or did that already happen?

If so will it be here or on reddit?
well Thanks for the heads up
Thiers an extra ME. In there somewhere. Not sure where though

Please polish it and try to not make it as full of bug as Warwick =) 
Warwick passive MS is full of bug, q is clunky, and sometimes R go through enemy... 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=owL6FUUkg9Q

I hope Nunu won't be bugged like that!! It's an amazing rework it would be a shame
